original: @ga_@#/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma
analyzed: @ga_@#/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma
translated: Praise to the Blessed Noble Tārā

original: la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
translated: In Sanskrit: Bhagavatī-āryatārāstotra-nāma

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ga wa ti ar+ya ta ra sto tra na ma/_bod🔽skad du/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/_rgyal
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ga wa ti ar+ya ta ra sto tra na ma/_bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/_rgyal
translated: In Tibetan: bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba

original: ba thams cad kyi phrin las gcig tu bsdus pa'i bdag nyid rje btshun ma sgrol ma la
analyzed: ba thams cad kyi phrin las gcig tu bsdus pa'i bdag nyid rje btshun ma sgrol ma la
translated: The one who embodies the unified activity of all the victors, the incomparable Tārā,🔽I pay homage to you.

original: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rgyal ba'i yum gyur sgrol ma nyid la/_/rgyal dang mkhas rnams
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rgyal ba'i yum gyur sgrol ma nyid la/_/rgyal dang mkhas rnams
translated: Although Tārā herself, the mother of the victors, has been praised by all the victors and the learned ones,

original: kun gyis bstod mod/_/bdag kyang de rjes 'jug par 'dod pas/_/lha mo
analyzed: kun gyis bstod mod/_/bdag kyang de rjes 'jug par 'dod pas/_/lha mo
translated: I too, desiring to follow in their footsteps,🔽will offer praise to you, O goddess.

original: khyod la bstod par bgyi'o/_/chos kun gshis lugs stong pa'i ngang las/
analyzed: khyod la bstod par bgyi'o/_/chos kun gshis lugs stong pa'i ngang las/
translated: From within the empty nature of all phenomena,🔽the seat of the eight-petaled lotus, free from the faults of saṃsāra,

original: 'khor ba'i skyon spangs 'dab brgyad gdan dang /_/byang chub sems rgyas ku
analyzed: 'khor ba'i skyon spangs 'dab brgyad gdan dang /_/byang chub sems rgyas ku
translated: and the seat of the fully bloomed utpala flower of bodhicitta,🔽I offer homage to the one born from the syllable taṃ.

original: mud gdan steng /_/tam yig las 'khrungs ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/sku mdog rab
analyzed: mud gdan steng /_/tam yig las 'khrungs ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/sku mdog rab
translated: Your body is the color of

original: mdzes mar gad mdangs ldan/_/bcu drug lo lon gzhon nu'i lus can/_/🔽'gying ldem sgeg pa'i rnam 'gyur dang ldan/_/sku mdog yongs rdzogs ma la phyag
analyzed: mdzes mar gad mdangs ldan/_/bcu drug lo lon gzhon nu'i lus can/_/ 'gying ldem sgeg pa'i rnam 'gyur dang ldan/_/sku mdog yongs rdzogs ma la phyag
translated: and has a beautiful smile.🔽I pay homage to the one with a fully developed body,🔽who is endowed with the grace of a swaying gait,🔽and whose face is like a full moon,

original: 'tshhal/_/yon tan cha shas ma lus rdzogs phyir/_/zla rgyas zhal la bzhi bcu'i
analyzed: 'tshhal/_/yon tan cha shas ma lus rdzogs phyir/_/zla rgyas zhal la bzhi bcu'i
translated: with the complete set of forty teeth.

original: bcom  'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: bcom  'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/
translated: Praise to the Noble Tara, the Transcendent Conqueror🔽Her eyes, which see the two truths, are long,

original: tshhems dang /_/bden gnyis gzigs pa'i spyan gnyis dkyus ring /_/mtshhan
analyzed: tshhems dang /_/bden gnyis gzigs pa'i spyan gnyis dkyus ring /_/mtshhan
translated: and she has the excellent major and minor marks.🔽I pay homage to the one with hair dark like a bee,

original: bzang mnga' ba ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/bung ba ltar gnag ral pa'i thor tshhugs/_/
analyzed: bzang mnga' ba ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/bung ba ltar gnag ral pa'i thor tshhugs/_/
translated: gathered in a topknot,🔽and the upper part of her body beautified by the goddess's ornaments.

original: lha mo sil bus sku stod mdzes byas/_/zhal ras bim pa'i kha dog gis mdzes/_/
analyzed: lha mo sil bus sku stod mdzes byas/_/zhal ras bim pa'i kha dog gis mdzes/_/
translated: Her face is lovely like a bimba fruit,🔽and she has the major and minor marks.

original: dpe byad ldan pa ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/phyag gnyis g.yas pas 'gro la mchog sbyin//
analyzed: dpe byad ldan pa ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/phyag gnyis g.yas pas 'gro la mchog sbyin//
translated: I pay homage to the one with two hands, the right one granting the supreme boon to beings,🔽and the left one holding a blue lotus to her heart,

original: g.yon pas thugs khar ud pal legs bsnams/_/zhabs gnyis g.yas brkyang
analyzed: g.yon pas thugs khar ud pal legs bsnams/_/zhabs gnyis g.yas brkyang
translated: with two legs, the right one🔽extended and the left one slightly bent.

original: g.yon skum tshhul gyis/_/'gro ba'i don bzhugs ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/lta bas
analyzed: g.yon skum tshhul gyis/_/'gro ba'i don bzhugs ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/lta bas
translated: With your left leg extended, you sit to benefit beings.🔽To you, whose eyes are never satisfied,🔽who are beautiful by your very nature,🔽what need have you for other ornaments, such as silk and jewels?

original: mi ngom mig gi bdud rtshi/_/khyod sku nyid kyis khyod nyid mdzes na/_/dar dang rin chen rgyan gzhan ci dgos/_/rang bzhin rgyan ldan ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/🔽rin chen rtshe bran rnams las dbu brgyan/_/do shal phyag gdub zhabs gdub
analyzed: mi ngom mig gi bdud rtshi/_/khyod sku nyid kyis khyod nyid mdzes na/_/dar dang rin chen rgyan gzhan ci dgos/_/rang bzhin rgyan ldan ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/ rin chen rtshe bran rnams las dbu brgyan/_/do shal phyag gdub zhabs gdub
translated: To you, who are naturally adorned, I pay homage.🔽Your head is adorned with a precious crest jewel,🔽and you wear a necklace, bracelets, anklets,🔽and jeweled earrings.

original: sil khrol/_/lha mi'i dar chen na bza' lhab lhub/_/mdzes byed rgyan ldan ma
analyzed: sil khrol/_/lha mi'i dar chen na bza' lhab lhub/_/mdzes byed rgyan ldan ma
translated: To you, who are adorned with beautiful ornaments, I pay homage.

original: la phyag 'tshhal/_/sngon tshhe byang chub spyad pa spyod dus/_/mthong thos dran reg
analyzed: la phyag 'tshhal/_/sngon tshhe byang chub spyad pa spyod dus/_/mthong thos dran reg
translated: When you were practicing bodhisattva conduct in the past,🔽you made the aspiration, “May all who see, hear, think of, or touch me

original: gyur pa kun kyang /_/go 'phang mchog thob gyur cig ces pa'i/_/smon lam
analyzed: gyur pa kun kyang /_/go 'phang mchog thob gyur cig ces pa'i/_/smon lam
translated: attain the supreme state.”🔽To you, who fulfilled that aspiration, I pay homage.

original: mthar phyin ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/'jig rten 'di na che ba'i che mchog_/dga'
analyzed: mthar phyin ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/'jig rten 'di na che ba'i che mchog_/dga'
translated: The greatest of the great in this world,🔽the lord of joy, the great god Mahesvara,

original: ba'i bdag po lha chen gtshug gis/_/khyod zhabs cod pan bzhin du gus mnos/_/
analyzed: ba'i bdag po lha chen gtshug gis/_/khyod zhabs cod pan bzhin du gus mnos/_/
translated: reverently bows his head to your feet, as if to a crown.

original: lha yi lhar gyur ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/khyod sku'i cha shas dbang po'i gzhu bzhin/_/
analyzed: lha yi lhar gyur ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/khyod sku'i cha shas dbang po'i gzhu bzhin/_/
translated: whose body is like the bow of Indra,🔽clear and distinct, appearing individually,🔽yet connected with things that are essentially empty.

original: gsal la ma 'dres so sor snang yang /_/rang bzhin dben pa'i dngos po dang 'brel/snang stong dbyer med ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/dri za'i glu bzhin snyan
analyzed: gsal la ma 'dres so sor snang yang /_/rang bzhin dben pa'i dngos po dang 'brel/snang stong dbyer med ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/dri za'i glu bzhin snyan
translated: Homage to you, mother, who are inseparable appearance and emptiness,🔽who with a melodious voice like the song of gandharvas

original: pa'i dbyangs kyis/_/gang la gang 'dul chos char phab kyang /_/'gro 'ong
analyzed: pa'i dbyangs kyis/_/gang la gang 'dul chos char phab kyang /_/'gro 'ong
translated: rains down the Dharma, taming each according to his needs,🔽yet free of the essence of coming, going, or abiding.

original: gnas gsum ngo bo dang bral/_/grags stong dbyer med ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/ji
analyzed: gnas gsum ngo bo dang bral/_/grags stong dbyer med ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/ji
translated: Homage to you, mother, who are inseparable sound and emptiness,🔽who, though you directly know all the phenomena of the way things are and all that exists,

original: lta ji snyed gshegs pa'i chos kun/_/ma 'dres ma 'khrug mngon sum mkhyen kyang //
analyzed: lta ji snyed gshegs pa'i chos kun/_/ma 'dres ma 'khrug mngon sum mkhyen kyang //
translated: unmixed and unconfused,🔽are free of the characteristics of knower and known.

original: shes dang shes bya'i mtshhan ma dang bral/_/rig stong dbyer med ma la phyag 'tshhal//
analyzed: shes dang shes bya'i mtshhan ma dang bral/_/rig stong dbyer med ma la phyag 'tshhal//
translated: Homage to you, mother, who are inseparable awareness and emptiness,🔽just as seeing a delightful person or gaining wealth brings joy,

original: mthong na dga' dang 'byor ldan smon bzhin/_/mgon khyod mthong dang thos pa
analyzed: mthong na dga' dang 'byor ldan smon bzhin/_/mgon khyod mthong dang thos pa
translated: so, protector, seeing or hearing you🔽removes unfavorable conditions and bestows the glory of favorable ones.

original: tsham gyis/_/mi mthun rkyen zhi mthun pa'i dpal ster/_/yid bzhin nor 'dra ma la
analyzed: tsham gyis/_/mi mthun rkyen zhi mthun pa'i dpal ster/_/yid bzhin nor 'dra ma la
translated: Homage to you, mother, who are like a wish-fulfilling gem,

original: phyag 'tshhal/_/sbrul gyi dug la ma ki'i rtshi bzhin/_/dgra dang chom rkun rgyal po'i
analyzed: phyag 'tshhal/_/sbrul gyi dug la ma ki'i rtshi bzhin/_/dgra dang chom rkun rgyal po'i
translated: the harm of enemies, thieves, kings,🔽and the like are completely pacified by the mere recollection of you.

original: chad sogs/_/dran pa tsham gyis rab du zhi mdzad/_/'jigs pa brgyad skyobs ma la🔽phyag 'tshhal/_/gang gis chos kun chub par 'dod kyang /_/gti mug mun pas blo
analyzed: chad sogs/_/dran pa tsham gyis rab du zhi mdzad/_/'jigs pa brgyad skyobs ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/gang gis chos kun chub par 'dod kyang /_/gti mug mun pas blo
translated: I pay homage to you, the protector from the eight dangers.🔽Those whose eyes of intelligence are blinded by the darkness of ignorance🔽and who wish to understand all phenomena🔽should supplicate you just a little,

original: mig mdongs rnams/_/khyod la cung zad gsol ba tsham gyis/_/shes rab mchog
analyzed: mig mdongs rnams/_/khyod la cung zad gsol ba tsham gyis/_/shes rab mchog
translated: and they will attain supreme wisdom.🔽I pay homage to you, the one who seeks wisdom.

original: rtshol ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/sgrib gnyis dgra las rgyal bar 'dod pa'i/_/mi des khyod
analyzed: rtshol ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/sgrib gnyis dgra las rgyal bar 'dod pa'i/_/mi des khyod
translated: The person who wishes to be victorious over the two obscuring enemies🔽should take you as his ally,

original: la dpung gnyen bcas nas/_/mun pa'i tshhogs la nyi ma'i 'od bzhin/_/ma rig
analyzed: la dpung gnyen bcas nas/_/mun pa'i tshhogs la nyi ma'i 'od bzhin/_/ma rig
translated: and like the sun’s rays to a mass of darkness,🔽ignorance will be dispelled.

original: mun sel ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/nam mkha'i khyon dang khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i/_/rgyal
analyzed: mun sel ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/nam mkha'i khyon dang khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i/_/rgyal
translated: I pay homage to you, the one who clears away the darkness of ignorance.🔽It is said that neither the expanse of space nor the extent of your knowledge

original: dang rgyal ba rgya mtshhor bcas pas/_/tshhad kyang bzung bar ma nus zhes grags/_/
analyzed: dang rgyal ba rgya mtshhor bcas pas/_/tshhad kyang bzung bar ma nus zhes grags/_/
translated: can be measured by the Victorious Ones and oceans of Victorious Ones.

original: mkhyen rabs mtha' yas ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/chu yi rgyun kyang dus kyis chad 'gyur//
analyzed: mkhyen rabs mtha' yas ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/chu yi rgyun kyang dus kyis chad 'gyur//
translated: The stream of water may be cut off by time,🔽But the stream of your compassionate activity

original: khyod kyi brtshe ba'i thugs rje'i chu rgyun/_/'khor ba srid du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i/_/
analyzed: khyod kyi brtshe ba'i thugs rje'i chu rgyun/_/'khor ba srid du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i/_/
translated: Will never be interrupted for as long as samsara exists.🔽I pay homage to the queen of compassion,

original: thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/brgyad khri bzhi stong nyon mongs
analyzed: thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/brgyad khri bzhi stong nyon mongs
translated: In the battle of the eighty-four thousand afflictions,

original: g.yul ngo /_/dpa' mo khyod nyid gcig pus bzlog par/_/nus pa'i mthu dpung
analyzed: g.yul ngo /_/dpa' mo khyod nyid gcig pus bzlog par/_/nus pa'i mthu dpung
translated: You alone, O heroine, are able to turn them back,🔽With inconceivable strength and power.

original: bsam mi khyab pa/_/skyob pa'i nus mthu bsam gyis mi khyab/_/rgya mtshho'i rlabs
analyzed: bsam mi khyab pa/_/skyob pa'i nus mthu bsam gyis mi khyab/_/rgya mtshho'i rlabs
translated: I pay homage to the one with inconceivable power to protect,🔽The waves of the ocean may be delayed by time,

original: kyang dus la yol srid/_/dpal khyod gdul bya 'dul ba'i dus la/_/skad gcig
analyzed: kyang dus la yol srid/_/dpal khyod gdul bya 'dul ba'i dus la/_/skad gcig
translated: But you, O glorious one, never delay for even a moment🔽In taming those to be tamed.

original: tsham yang yol ba mi mnga'/_/phrin las myur mgyogs ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/rang
analyzed: tsham yang yol ba mi mnga'/_/phrin las myur mgyogs ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/rang
translated: I pay homage to the one with swift activity,

original: gzhan don bya'i kun rtog bral yang /_/yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsam shing
analyzed: gzhan don bya'i kun rtog bral yang /_/yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsam shing
translated: Though free from thoughts of benefiting self and other,🔽Like a wish-fulfilling gem and a wish-granting tree,

original: bzhin/_/so so'i skal dang 'tshham par don rang gzhan gnyis/_/'bad med lhun
analyzed: bzhin/_/so so'i skal dang 'tshham par don rang gzhan gnyis/_/'bad med lhun
translated: You effortlessly and spontaneously accomplish the welfare of both self and other.🔽I pay homage to the one who spontaneously accomplishes the welfare of both self and other,

original: grub ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/nyi shu rtsha gcig phyag 'tshhal mchog 'dis/_/thugs rje
analyzed: grub ma la phyag 'tshhal/_/nyi shu rtsha gcig phyag 'tshhal mchog 'dis/_/thugs rje
translated: By this supreme homage, twenty-one times,🔽to the compassionate one,

original: mnga' ba rje btshun ma la/_/mi phyed dad pas rgyun du bstod na/_/mchog gi dngos
analyzed: mnga' ba rje btshun ma la/_/mi phyed dad pas rgyun du bstod na/_/mchog gi dngos
translated: if one always praises with undivided faith,🔽the supreme

original: bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/🔽grub thob par gyur cig_/ye shes kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la/_shakya'i dge slong
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ grub thob par gyur cig_/ye shes kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la/_shakya'i dge slong
translated: The Praise of the Blessed Noble Tārā, called The Supreme🔽May you attain accomplishment!🔽The praise by the Shakya bhikṣu

original: dad byed go cha rin chen zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: dad byed go cha rin chen zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: Dedicating Faith, called Ratnavarma, to the wisdom goddess Mahāmāyā is complete.

original: lotsh+tshha ba rig pa'i khu byug gis bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab pa'o//_//
analyzed: lotsh+tshha ba rig pa'i khu byug gis bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab pa'o//_//
translated: It was translated and finalized by Lotsāwa Vīryakīrti.
